cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.udpbroadcast

Class UDPBroadcastRuntimeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.udpbroadcast.UDPBroadcastRuntimeBuilder

  • public class UDPBroadcastRuntimeBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for the cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.runtime.RuntimeFramework equipped with the UDP broadcast knowledge cloning capability. It creates the builder using #build(String, cz.cuni.mff.d3s.deeco.model.runtime.api.RuntimeMetadata, UDPBroadcast) method by using UDPBroadcastHost and custom NonRebroadcastingKnowledgeDataManager

    The rest is the same as standard JDEECo runtime initialization.

    --------------------------- Created by Jakub Kinst 2014 E-mail: jakub@kinst.cz
